Text.Page:
This place was once the center of the giants' empire. It's ruined now, of course, but...it was once so great.

It's so exciting to be among so much history! I'm here studying the ancient cityâ€”or I was before the kulkaris arrived.

As soon as they're gone, though...I'll be back out there."Can I help in the meantime?"

Well, I can't get back to my research unless I explore outside the camp. If you're willing to brave it, you could investigate the giants' relics in Mags Kurata to the north and Mags Kuchanaru to the west.

Any fragments with anything that looks like writing would be wonderful.

It's amazing how the giants were able to make such beautiful, delicate things. You always imagine them as clumsy and oafish.

Thank you, . We can learn more about the area with these and gain an edge over our enemy.
Your hands are empty. Have you not gone out yet?
